text: What do you see going on? Well, the boy's on a ladder and the ladder's tipped over. Not a ladder, it's a step-step. And, uh, he's gone. From what I can see, he's going to upset the cookies. Yeah. And, uh, sink is falling over on the floor. While the mother, I guess, is drying the dishes. So I'm telling you, I don't want to be on this...
